hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.ZR Frogs in the Rain: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #the Gerudo Card# and #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Purple Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key Ring# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_items: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Huge Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.
